price: 18. Woo ayro meesi gibdah qaran qanxixah, Yalli is tamaatu waytaamah hee xagni yamaatuwaam raq mali.
arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: al-samāu munfaṭirun bihi kāna waʿduhu mafʿūlan
